page.title: Assurance of Salvation
page.verse: NIV..And this is the testimony: God has given us eternal life, and this life is in his Son. He who has the Son has life; he who does not have the Son of God does not have life.

page.title: Assurance of Answered Prayer
page.verse: Until now you have not asked for anything in my name. Ask and you will receive, and your joy will be complete.

page.title: Assurance of Victory
page.verse: No temptation has seized you except what is common to man. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can stand up under it.

page.title: Assurance of Forgiveness
page.verse: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

page.title: Assurance of Guidance
page.verse: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

page.title: Christ the Center
page.verse: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come.

page.title: God's Word
page.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness.

page.title: Fellowship
page.verse: And let us consider how we may spur one another on toward love and good deeds. Let us not give up meeting together, as some are in the habit of doing, but let us encourage one another—and all the more as you see the Day approaching.

page.title: Obedience to Christ
page.verse: Therefore, I urge you, brothers, in view of God's mercy, to offer your bodies as living sacrifices, holy and pleasing to God—this is your spiritual act of worship.

page.title: Prayer
page.verse: If you remain in me and my words remain in you, ask whatever you wish, and it will be given you.

page.title: Witnessing
page.verse: "Come, follow me," Jesus said, "and I will make you fishers of men."

page.title: All Have Sinned
page.verse: For all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.

page.title: Christ Paid the Penalty
page.verse: But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

page.title: Must Receive Christ
page.verse: Yet to all who received him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God.

page.title: Sin's Penalty
page.verse: For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

page.title: Salvation Not By Works
page.verse: For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith—and this not from yourselves, it is the gift of God—not by works, so that no one can boast.

page.title: Assurance of Salvation
page.verse: I write these things to you who believe in the name of the Son of God so that you may know that you have eternal life.
